trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Arvada
There were no other sightings in Arvada on or around January 25th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside with my back against a wall smoking a cigarette, when I noticed an object moving northerly out of the southern sky. The object did not have any normal beacon lights that planes normally have, but pulsated steadily. The object appeared to move slowly. Then made a sudden 90 degree shift in motion to the west followed shortly thereafter by a sudden diagonal move to the northeast. The object then began a holding pattern of moving in the shape of a cross, small circles and wavy patterns. There was no wind and so I was able to use the tree in the backyard as a reference point for its movement. It's movement could be detected as it crossed behind several branches in the various patterns stated above.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Object moving north out of the southern sky, just to the east of Orion
